import { Row, Column, Card, CardHeader, Heading, CardBody, EmptyState, Button } from '@innovaccer/design-system';
    () => {
  return (
    <Row>
      <Column size="8">
        <Card>
          <CardHeader>
            <Heading size="s">Daily progress</Heading>
          </CardHeader>
          <CardBody>
            <EmptyState
              title="Unable to fetch data"
              description="Sorry there was a technical issue while getting this data. Please try again."
              imageSrc={image}
              size="small"
              className="pb-6"
            >
              <Button icon="refresh" iconAlign="left" className="mt-3">
                Reload
              </Button>
            </EmptyState>
          </CardBody>
        </Card>
      </Column>
    </Row>
  );
}

message.code:
import { Row, Column, Message } from '@innovaccer/design-system';
    () => (
  <Row>
    <Column size="8">
      <Message appearance="alert" description="Could not start verification. Please try again later." />
    </Column>
  </Row>
)

import { Row, Column, Message, Text } from '@innovaccer/design-system';
    () => (
  <Row>
    <Column size="8">
      <Message
        actions={
          <>
            <Text className="cursor-pointer" appearance="link">
              Try again
            </Text>
          </>
        }
      >
        <Text appearance="default">Sorry we couldn't subscribe you. Please try again.</Text>
      </Message>
    </Column>
  </Row>
)

import { Row, Column, Message } from '@innovaccer/design-system';
    () => (

)

    () => (

  </Row>
)

import { Label, Textarea } from '@innovaccer/design-system';
    () => (

    <Label withInput={true} htmlFor="comments">
      Comments
    </Label>

      className="w-50"
      placeholder="Enter your comments here"
    />

)

import { Heading, Text, Card, Table, Paragraph, Row, Column } from '@innovaccer/design-system'; () => { React.useEffect(() => { const collection = document.getElementsByClassName('setBgColor'); giveBgColor(collection); }); const textColorsSchema = getSchema('color', 'aA bB cC'); const fontSizeSchema = getSchema('fontSize', 'aA bB cC'); const fontWeightSchema = getSchema('fontWeight', 'aA bB cC'); const fontHeightSchema = getSchema('lineHeight', 'aA bB cC', '', { backgroundColor: 'var(--secondary-light)' }); return (
Design Tokens

Typography The design system has many built in tokens to easily solve most common use cases surrounding text and its formatting.

Text Colors
Font Family The --font-family token provides with Nunito sans font family which is used throughout the design system.
Normal Text
Nunito Sans
Font Size

Font Weight

Font Height

Letter Spacing The --letter-spacing token provides with 0.5px of spacing between letters.
Text without letter spacing
Text with letter spacing

); }
